message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $14,000. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit steep for me.  Would you consider $10,500?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $10,500 is too low.  Could you do $13,000?
I understand, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $11,500?
